title: Just got an eviction notice today NIIIIICE (sarcasm intended)
body:
fully intend to fight it as the reasoning is how you say deplorableh.
Just cause my mother in law babysits my son with autism lol... do you know how hard it is to find a baby sitter that can watch a child with autism? 
So if they dont believe me that I havent been allowing her to stay the night over the 14 day maximum allowed in a lease year I have two legal arguments.
1. it should fall under my sons autistic reasonable accomodation which is a law that requires reasonable accomodation for someone with a disability.
2. ONLY I was named in the eviction notice so my family should be able to stay and I can just go live somewhere else lol. 
fuun fun fun
oh and why are supports easy mode?
